title: SCP-CN-1109
source:
[[module:1109f1 css]]
.object-class.{$safe-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class.{$euclid-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class.{$keter-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class.{$thaumiel-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class.{$apollyon-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class.{$archon-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class.{$explained-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .esoteric,
.object-class:not(.{$safe-tag}\,) .safe,
.object-class.{$euclid-tag}\, .safe,
.object-class.{$keter-tag}\, .safe,
.object-class.{$thaumiel-tag}\, .safe,
.object-class.{$apollyon-tag}\, .safe,
.object-class.{$archon-tag}\, .safe,
.object-class.{$explained-tag}\, .safe,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .safe,
.object-class:not(.{$euclid-tag}\,) .euclid,
.object-class.{$keter-tag}\, .euclid,
.object-class.{$thaumiel-tag}\, .euclid,
.object-class.{$apollyon-tag}\, .euclid,
.object-class.{$archon-tag}\, .euclid,
.object-class.{$explained-tag}\, .euclid,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .euclid,
.object-class:not(.{$keter-tag}\,) .keter,
.object-class.{$thaumiel-tag}\, .keter,
.object-class.{$apollyon-tag}\, .keter,
.object-class.{$archon-tag}\, .keter,
.object-class.{$explained-tag}\, .keter,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .keter,
.object-class:not(.{$thaumiel-tag}\,) .thaumiel,
.object-class.{$apollyon-tag}\, .thaumiel,
.object-class.{$archon-tag}\, .thaumiel,
.object-class.{$explained-tag}\, .thaumiel,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .thaumiel,
.object-class:not(.{$apollyon-tag}\,) .apollyon,
.object-class.{$archon-tag}\, .apollyon,
.object-class.{$explained-tag}\, .apollyon,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .apollyon,
.object-class:not(.{$archon-tag}\,) .archon,
.object-class.{$explained-tag}\, .archon,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .archon,
.object-class:not(.{$explained-tag}\,) .explained,
.object-class.{$neutralized-tag}\, .explained,
.object-class:not(.{$neutralized-tag}\,) .neutralized {
  display: none;
}
#u-p-3:target ~ .page-content-wrap .key-elem {
  animation-delay: 2s !important;
}
[[/module:1109f1]]

[[module:1109f2 ListPages category="{$category}" tags="{$scp-tag}" created_by="{$user}" limit="250" perPage="250" separate="no" wrapper="no"]]

[[div class="fragment-2 box-appear" style="animation-delay: calc(1s * (min(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5) * 1 + (2 - (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) * 0.08) * (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) / 2 + max(%%total%% - %%index%% - 15, 0) * 0.2 + 20));"]]

[[div_ class="item-wrap %%name%%" style="animation-duration: calc(1s * (min(0.2, (1 - (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) * 0.08) * 0.5))); animation-delay: calc(1s * (min(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5) * 1 + (2 - (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) * 0.08) * (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) / 2 + max(%%total%% - %%index%% - 15, 0) * 0.2 + 20));"]]

**[[span class="data-found"]]%%title_linked%%[[/span]]**
{$object-class}{{[[span class="object-class %%tags%%"]][[span class="data-found"]][[span class="box-disappear" style="animation-delay: calc(1s * (min(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5) * 1 + (2 - (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) * 0.08) * (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) / 2 + max(%%total%% - %%index%% - 15, 0) * 0.2 + 20 + (1 - (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) * 0.08) * 0.6));"]][[span class="esoteric"]]{$esoteric} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="safe"]]{$safe} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="euclid"]]{$euclid} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="keter"]]{$keter} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="thaumiel"]]{$thaumiel} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="apollyon"]]{$apollyon} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="archon"]]{$archon} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="explained"]]{$explained} ##transparent|{$neutralized}##[[/span]][[span class="neutralized"]]{$neutralized}[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="box-appear" style="animation-delay: calc(1s * (min(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5) * 1 + (2 - (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) * 0.08) * (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) / 2 + max(%%total%% - %%index%% - 15, 0) * 0.2 + 20 + (1 - (min(max(%%total%% - %%index%%, 5), 15) - 5) * 0.08) * 0.6));"]][[span class="esoteric"]]--{$esoteric}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="safe"]]--{$safe}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="euclid"]]--{$euclid}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="keter"]]--{$keter}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="thaumiel"]]--{$thaumiel}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="apollyon"]]--{$apollyon}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="archon"]]--{$archon}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="explained"]]--{$explained}-- {$neutralized}[[/span]][[span class="neutralized"]]{$neutralized}[[/span]][[/span]][[/span]][[/span]]}}

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/module:1109f2]]

[[module:1109f3 ListPages category="{$category}" tags="{$scp-tag}" created_by="{$user}" order="rating desc" perPage="1" separate="no" wrapper="no"]]

[[module:1109f4 css]]
.not-found {
  display: none !important;
}
[[/module:1109f4]]

[[#ifexpr %%total%% > 1
|
[[module:1109f5 css]]
.item-wrap.%%name%% .data-found,
.item-wrap:not(.%%name%%) .data-expunged {
  display: none;
}
#u-p-3:target ~ .page-content-wrap .key-elem {
  animation-delay: 12s !important;
}
[[/module:1109f5]]
]]
